input_args.passage: "David Wells' perfect game | On May 17, 1998, David Wells of the New York Yankees pitched the 15th perfect game in Major League Baseball history and the second in team history."
input_args.claim: 'From and we know that David Wells of the New York Yankees pitched a perfect game on May 17, 1998 and the team he was playing against was the Minnesota Twins, which is the team that Paul Molitor was part of.'
